name: Braincase
description:
A game created for the 2020 Spring Thing Festival.

This is something I'm been thinking about for a while, but was never sure how to approach. Also this may be a bit of a heavy game, especially while everyone is in isolation, so I apologize. The game deals with privacy concerns, police corruption, and how the victims of violence, or any kind of tragedy, are actual people, more than just a series of facts. I don't know if I managed to tackle these themes well (possibly not) but I hope so.

Content Warning:
Violence, Hunting, Police Brutality, Language, Minor Flashing Lights
